arguments.text:
We are aware of recent statements on social media suggesting that our $5M donation to XYZ Foundation was misused. After a thorough review and verification with CharityWatch, we can confirm that the full amount was transferred directly to XYZ Foundation’s official account on June 15, 2025, and has been used in accordance with the agreed‑upon charitable program. We take our philanthropic responsibilities very seriously and remain committed to transparency. If you have any further questions, please contact our CSR team at csr@brandco.com.

Thank you for your continued trust and support.

— BrandCo Communications Team
